description: This file defines API routes for managing notes in a FastAPI application, including listing, creating, retrieving, updating, and deleting notes associated with authenticated users.

classes.name: None
classes.description: This file does not define any classes.

methods.name: List[NoteOut] list_notes( q: Optional[str] = Query(None, description="Search query over title/content."), limit: int = Query(100, ge=1, le=200, description="Max number of notes to return."), offset: int = Query(0, ge=0, description="Pagination offset."), db: Session = Depends(get_db), user: User = Depends(get_current_user), )
methods.description: Handles GET requests to list notes, optionally filtered by a search query.

methods.name: NoteOut create_note( payload: NoteCreate, db: Session = Depends(get_db), user: User = Depends(get_current_user), )
methods.description: Handles POST requests to create a new note.

methods.name: NoteOut get_note( note_id: int, db: Session = Depends(get_db), user: User = Depends(get_current_user), )
methods.description: Handles GET requests to retrieve a specific note by ID.

methods.name: NoteOut update_note( note_id: int, payload: NoteUpdate, db: Session = Depends(get_db), user: User = Depends(get_current_user), )
methods.description: Handles PUT requests to update an existing note.

methods.name: None delete_note( note_id: int, db: Session = Depends(get_db), user: User = Depends(get_current_user), )
methods.description: Handles DELETE requests to remove a note.
